report.title: Record data for record details
report.description: Report used to retrieve details of a record excluding custom attributes for the record details 2 prebuilt form.
report.query: select #columns# from cache_occurrences_functional o join cache_occurrences_nonfunctional onf on onf.id=o.id join cache_samples_nonfunctional snf on snf.id=o.sample_id join samples s on s.id=o.sample_id and s.deleted=false join cache_taxa_taxon_lists cttl on cttl.id=o.taxa_taxon_list_id join users u on u.id=o.created_by_id join people p on p.id=u.person_id left join licences l on l.id=o.licence_id and l.deleted=false #agreements_join# #joins# where o.id=#occurrence_id# and #sharing_filter#

param.name: occurrence_id
param.description: ID of the occurrence to load

param.name: geom_precision
param.join: join map_squares msq on msq.id = o.map_sq_#geom_precision#km_id
join map_squares msq on msq.id = o.map_sq_1km_id

param.name: allow_sensitive_full_precision
param.description: Allow viewing of sensitive records at full precision

column.name: taxon
column.sql: case o.zero_abundance when true then '<span class="zero-abundance">' || cttl.taxon || '<span> - zero abundance found' else cttl.taxon end

column.name: inputter
column.sql: case p.surname || case when p.first_name is null or p.first_name='' then '' else ', ' || p.first_name end when snf.recorders then null else p.surname || case when p.first_name is null or p.first_name='' then '' else ', ' || p.first_name end end

column.name: record_status
column.sql:
CASE WHEN o.record_status='V' AND o.record_substatus=1 THEN 'Accepted as correct' WHEN o.record_status='V' AND o.record_substatus=2 THEN 'Accepted as considered correct' WHEN o.record_status='V' THEN 'Accepted' WHEN o.record_status='C' AND o.record_substatus=3 THEN 'Plausible' WHEN o.record_status='C' THEN 'Awaiting review' WHEN o.record_status='D' THEN 'Queried' WHEN o.record_status='I' THEN 'Data entry in progress' WHEN o.record_status='R' AND o.record_substatus=4 THEN 'Rejected as unable to verify' WHEN o.record_status='R' AND o.record_substatus=5 THEN 'Rejected as incorrect' WHEN o.record_status='R' THEN 'Rejected' END || CASE WHEN o.query='Q' AND o.query IS NOT NULL AND o.record_status<>'V' THEN '
Queried.' ELSE '' END

column.name: sensitive
column.sql: CASE o.sensitive WHEN true THEN 'This record is sensitive' ELSE '' END

column.name: entered_sref
column.sql: case #allow_sensitive_full_precision# when '1' then s.entered_sref else snf.public_entered_sref end

column.name: sample_comment
column.sql: case when o.sensitive=false or #allow_sensitive_full_precision#='1' then snf.comment else null end

column.name: geom
column.sql: case when #allow_sensitive_full_precision#='1' then st_astext(s.geom) when '#geom_precision#'='' then st_astext(o.public_geom) else st_astext(msq.geom) end
